hero.description: Frontend engineering leader with 6+ years of experience building regulated digital products. Specializing in React, Next.js, and TypeScript.

about.title: About
about.bio: I'm a passionate frontend engineer and technical leader with deep expertise in building scalable, user-centric applications. My journey has taken me from full-stack development to leading frontend teams, where I focus on architectural decisions, code quality, and developer experience. I thrive in regulated industries where precision and reliability are paramount.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: A selection of professional and personal projects I've worked on

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities, interesting projects, or just having a chat about technology.
